title: How can we tackle vaccine inequity in Africa?
description: Just 2.5% of the 6.4 billion vaccine doses administered globally, have been in given Africa, despite the continent making up 17% of the world's population.
cleaned_text: vaccine inequity in Africa? To achieve 40% vaccination coverage by the end of 2021, many African countries need to ramp up their daily vaccination rates by up to five times.
